tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE class_timing (
  class_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  course_id INT REFERENCES course_schedule(course_id),
  day_of_week VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  start_time TIME NOT NULL,
  end_time TIME NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Courses (course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	course_name TEXT,
	course_time TIME,
	course_day TEXT);

CREATE TABLE class_timings (
    class_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    day_of_week VARCHAR(20),
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    room_no INT
);

CREATE TABLE enrollment (
    enrollment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    course_id INT,
    enrollment_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES student(student_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES course_schedule(course_id)
);
